name: @discue/vuepress-plugin-outline
author: Stefan Pfaffel
description: Adds an outline of the current page's headlines to the right side of the screen

scripts.release: standard-version && git push --follow-tags origin && npm publish
scripts.release-major: standard-version --release-as major && git push --follow-tags origin main && npm publish --access public
scripts.release-minor: standard-version --release-as minor && git push --follow-tags origin main && npm publish --access public
